DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , randomize , parallel-group , placebo-controlled study assess local nasal tolerability safety multiple administration topically ( intranasally ) administer 1146A deliver nasal spray applicator healthy adult participant
DOC.brief_title: Local Nasal Tolerability Safety Study 1146A Healthy Adult Participants
DOC.criteria: Demonstrates understand study procedure , restriction willingness participate evidenced voluntary write informed consent receive sign date copy inform consent form . Willing confine 9 day ( 8 night ) acceptance standardize food beverage throughout confine study period Aged 18 55 year inclusive Male female Good general mental health , opinion investigator medically qualify designee , clinically significant relevant abnormality medical history upon physical nasal examination Participant free disease concomitant treatment could interfere interpretation study result determine investigator sponsor 's medical officer Females childbearing potential , opinion investigator , practice reliable method contraception .
